[[Beowulf (disambiguation)]]}}: ''Beowulf: The Monsters and The Critics'', 1937 edition]]

{{disambig-more: '''''Beowulf: The Monsters and the Critics''''' is the title of a lecture by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and its shortened publication in book-form. Note that the original and much longer manuscript of the lecture was published as ''[[Beowulf and the Critics]]'' in [[2002]], edited by [[Michael D.C. Drout]]. Drout has described the lecture as "possibl[y] ... the single most influential essay in the history of literary studies in the twentieth century".<ref>[[Michael Drout
[[Beowulf (disambiguation)]]}}: 'Beowulf: The Monsters and the Critics': The Brilliant Essay that Broke Beowulf Studies], The Lord of the Rings Fanatics Plaza, April 25, 2010. Retrieved June 1, 2016.</ref>

{{disambig-more: The lecture "Beowulf: The Monsters and the Critics" was the Sir Israel Gollancz Memorial Lecture for 1936. Tolkien delivered it to the British Academy on [[25 November]] [[1936]] and again two weeks later to the Manchester Mediaeval Society.

[[Beowulf (disambiguation)]]}}: ''Beowulf: The Monsters and The Critics'', c.1969 edition]]

{{disambig-more: ''Beowulf: The Monsters and the Critics'' has been published in several different editions.

In [[1937]], the first edition of ''Beowulf: The Monsters and the Critics'' was published by Humphrey Milford (London) for the British Academy (<nowiki>[</nowiki>[[1 July]]<nowiki>]</nowiki>. 56 pp. 500 copies printed. ISBN: N/A). It was also issued in the ''Proceedings of the British Academy'' (vol. 22, 1936, pr. 1937, pp. [245]-295).<ref>[[Åke Bertenstam
Beowulf: Bertenstam, Åke]]:  ''Chronological Bibliography of the Writings of J.R.R. Tolkien''</ref>

{{disambig-more: Around [[1969]], booklets of ''Beowulf: The Monsters and the Critics'' (undated and unknown publisher and place of publication), appeared.<ref>''An Illustrated Tolkien Bibliography'' at [http://tolkienbooks.net/
In [[1983]], the lecture was included in ''[[The Monsters and the Critics
Beowulf: The Monsters and the Critics and Other Essays]]'', edited by [[Christopher Tolkien]].
